texts.title: Practice Growth Mindset
texts.scenario: You're struggling with a difficult math problem...
texts.action1: Replace 'I can't do this' with 'I can't do this YET'
texts.action2: Break the problem into smaller, manageable steps
texts.action3: Ask for help and try a different strategy
texts.outcome: You solve it and your brain gets stronger!
